Continuous

```js
<Slider />
```

Continuous Controlled with Custom Min/Max/Step

```js
class SliderExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: 100 };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Slider
          min={50}
          max={300}
          step={10}
          value={this.state.value}
          onChange={value => this.setState({ value })}
        />
        <div>Value: {this.state.value}</div>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<SliderExample />;
```

Discrete

```js
<Slider discrete />
```

Discrete Controlled with Custom Min/Max/Step

```js
class SliderExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: 100 };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Slider
          discrete
          min={50}
          max={300}
          value={this.state.value}
          onChange={value => this.setState({ value })}
        />
        <div>Value: {this.state.value}</div>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<SliderExample />;
```
